com.github.davidmoten.reels

Interface Actor<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActor, ActorDoNothing, DeadLetterActor

    public interface Actor<T>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMessage(Message<T> message)
      Processes a queued message to the actor.
      void onStop(ActorRef<T> self)
      This method called after an actor is stopped (via ActorRef.stop() or when an actor is restarted.
      void preStart(ActorRef<T> self)
      Called just after creating this (either initially or on supervisor initiated restart), before processing any messages.

    • Method Detail

      • preStart

        void preStart(ActorRef<T> self)
        Called just after creating this (either initially or on supervisor initiated restart), before processing any messages.
        Parameters:
        self - ActorRef referring to this

      • onMessage

        void onMessage(Message<T> message)
        Processes a queued message to the actor. If this method throws then the Supervisor allocated to the Actor will handle it (default is Supervisor.defaultSupervisor().
        Parameters:
        message - message to be processed

      • onStop

        void onStop(ActorRef<T> self)
        This method called after an actor is stopped (via ActorRef.stop() or when an actor is restarted.
        Parameters:
        self - ActorRef referring to this
